item.title: Solarcentury, UK, Solar PV power for homes and businesses - Ashden Award winner
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k_yo1wOvFks This video can be downloaded here: http://www.ashdenawards.org/winners/solarcentury Solarcentury won an Ashden Award for Sustainable Energy in 2007. Solarcentury is a beacon for the UK’s solar power market, showing how attractive, flexible and easy to install solar PV can be, even in crowded urban areas. The company has used innovative design to develop a range of excellent solar products – mainly solar PV panels and some solar water heating – and mounting systems to fit a wide range of buildings, including industrial estates.
